item.description:
Why Evolution is True, by Jerry Coyne. A professor at the University of Chicago, Coyne makes the basics of evolutionary biology accessible to the nonscientist and in doing so also shows why creationisim is not the way life works.

Bring a little food to eat and share! Robyn will provide drinks (coffee, tea, soda, water, etc)

Watch his lecture about this book at the Harvard Natural History Museum web site

Â 

PLEASE NOTE LOCATION CHANGE
item.name: Book Discussion & Brown Bag Lunch
